website_summaries.verdict: This handsome appliance has seven levels of water pH; adjust as you wish.
pros: LCD display for easy adjustment and monitoring
Users say they notice a difference in taste
some say they feel physically better after drinking the ionized water
cons: The filter replacements must be of the same brand

customer_reviews.title: Functionality is as easy as pressing a button and start letting run water ...
customer_reviews.text: The product works as expected, installation is not as difficult as one would expect but it will depend on the type of faucet you have. You can test the alkalinity level and notice it will perfectly match the indicated pH level. Functionality is as easy as pressing a button and start letting run water through it. The only tiny inconvenient I see is that it seems active carbon filter life span seems to be decreasing a bit fast, so you may need to change it every 6 to 9 months depending on the use and the quality of water at your locality.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price you cannot beat it. Although I had to get the Motherboard replaced after 3 months, Stan had it back in about a week Didn't even have to pay postage. You have to understand this is not a 3-4 Thousand Water Machine and have to take precautions like cleaning often and I advise if your filling jugs to give it about a 10 minute break in between. Otherwise than that, I love the thing. Even has a meter that works correctly as I have all the instruments to check what the machine puts out.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts that say they should be included.
customer_reviews.text: No quality control. Bought this item twice and returning it twice due to missing parts. Still no response from the company, and regret giving them a second chance. The first box was missing parts and I thought it was because it was already returned. This time I got a new box and was missing the parts that say are to be included. So sad that these folks can’t get it together, because I believe that everyone who’s gotten a complete product really does have a good one. Heads up healthy water drinking friends... Would like you not to have to go through the frustration I’ve been going through for the past two months.
customer_reviews.author: Erin C.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. After checking many differents machines I found this ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. After checking many differents machines I found this one, the most thing that call attention was how the manufacturer described the manufacturing process such as the name of the pruducers of the main parts of the machine, I looked at dozens of different machines, but this one is the best a could find.
customer_reviews.author: AJR

customer_reviews.title: Really the most amazing machine! We learned about the benefits of alkaline ...
customer_reviews.text: Really the most amazing machine! We learned about the benefits of alkaline water at a health seminar, and my wife and I decided it was a great investment in us to get a machine...the IONtech from Intelgadgets is easy to use and install...and the water not only tastes great, but also tests super high in PH & low in ORP. We highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor and purity of the water. It's many uses are essential for today in this world of fresh water.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and doesn’t work as stated
customer_reviews.text: The water flow is low and after 100 liters the flow starts to reduce little by little and after 400 liters it almost stop. I have to change the filter after 600 liters, because at this point it takes almost 5min/liter. Couldn’t find the client support channel
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Enokihara

customer_reviews.title: First Impression of the Iontech IT 757
customer_reviews.text: I researched many water Ionizers before deciding to purchase the Iotech IT 757. There are tons of Ionizers to choose from but why pay thousands when you can pay hundreds for basically the same results (alkaline water ). I have only had this unit for 4 days so I can't honestly grade the Iontech Alkaline water machine just yet but i will say the unit seems to perform as intended and looks nice in my kitchen. Installation was easy as 123 and the water tastes great. I will update this review in a few weeks after we take the ionizer through its paces.
customer_reviews.author: STL GUY

customer_reviews.title: Nice Alkaline System
customer_reviews.text: Nice Alkaline System - Produces what each settings says on PH meter.
customer_reviews.author: DA GURU

customer_reviews.title: Almost bought one for $4000
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness I did not! This alkaline machine works like a dream. Totally worth. Easy to install and I had it working in about 15 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Krysta

customer_reviews.title: the best customer service ever from Stan
customer_reviews.text: the best customer service ever from Stan. my sister has been drinking ionized water for a few months and her back pains are gone and i am hoping for the same. i am a woman in my late 40's and was able to install this myself using a double diverter (painted oil rubbed bronze myself) woder undersink 10K water filter flowing into a Jado cold tap faucet to my ionizer...all from amazon
customer_reviews.author: chris CA

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this product a week ago and the plastic faucet connector already broke on me...twice. I can't wash the dishes or drink clean water without water spraying all over the place. This is unacceptable for such an expensive item and I am extremely disappointed in the quality of the product. I expect higher quality replacement parts sent to me to fix the issue.
customer_reviews.author: YJ ***

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased So Far
customer_reviews.text: Only had this machine a short time. But it was easy to install in my kitchen and set-up. Water tastes great. And I like all the easy to understand settings and features offered by this certainly not cheap, but very reasonably priced water/health machine. Have a really bad autoimmune disease (Hashimoto's), with built up symptoms over the years. Already seen some noted improvements in my disease symptoms with reduced leg swelling and greater mobility and stamina. If that's all it does for me that's plenty good enough for me. But I am confident it will do even more for me as my body becomes more Alkaline from drinking only the water from this machine over a longer period of time.
customer_reviews.author: JMPO

customer_reviews.title: filter is more expensive
customer_reviews.text: This akaline IONtech IT-757 is made in taiwan. I don't know how it lasts and water taste good.
customer_reviews.author: duyson

customer_reviews.title: Super happy.
customer_reviews.text: Super happy..... Easy install water taste great and the proof is in the putting..... Now I got this today so let's see how long the filter and the unit last for.... But overall for now.... Happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Lesmes R.

customer_reviews.title: I have had this for a year and it still ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a year and it still is not saying that it needs a new filter. Do they last this long or is this a defect?
customer_reviews.author: Dan Higgins

customer_reviews.title: The wife is very happy. if your not sure by using the instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: This machine is simple to set up and operate. The wife is very happy. if your not sure by using the instructions check You Tube.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan Robich

customer_reviews.title: Things are reasonable, but this machine has problem. ...
customer_reviews.text: Things are reasonable, but this machine has problem. There is no different STRENGTH level of alkaline water. They are supposed to be 4 different strength levels, but they don't work. I winded up drinking very strong alkaline water that makes my mouth/throat sore, tingling very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Park

customer_reviews.title: really nice look in your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Hi,the product is what it said ..really nice look in your kitchen...the only problem is that there is no lock of switch.
customer_reviews.author: PB.

customer_reviews.title: Love it, ORP and PH really nice now just ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, ORP and PH really nice now just having ppm from 180 to 86 after 10 mn on level 2 acid, would like to know if possible to lower more without losing the properties of the water (Osmosis); probably 3 filtering?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great household item
customer_reviews.text: I begun to use Alkaline Ionizer Machine and noticed some great benefits pretty soon. I use acidic settings to wash my produce, so it stays fresh longer, I wash my face so it prevents skin from break outs, alkaline settings are for drinking water - I always use this water when working out - stamina and endurance increased.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

product_meta.title: IntelGadgets IONtech IT-757 Advanced Alkaline Water Ionizer Machine 7 pH Water Levels, Platinum Titanium Electrolysis Plates
product_meta.description: Ensure that you drink clean, high-quality water with the Intelgadgets IONtech IT-757 advanced alkaline water ionizer. It features a sleek design and a seven-color display screen to act as an intuitive interface. Choose from multiple filtration and pH levels to get water for drinking, cleaning and other needs. This alkaline water ionizer machine also features automatic cleaning cycles and alerts for when full cleaning or a new filter is needed.
feature_bullets: ADVANCED DESIGN AND INTERFACE: Intelgadgets IONtech IT-757 advanced alkaline water ionizer has an extra large, 7-color, LCD display screen that displays information like filter life, pH level, ORP and more; Sleek silver-color to match kitchen, colorful soft-touch selection buttons with useful icons and descriptive labels, (HxWxD): 12.2" x 8.7" x 4.9" and 13 lbs

MULTIPLE FILTRATION FUNCTIONS: Purifies water by removing chemicals and impurities like chlorine, salt, dirt, pesticides and other pollutants; Carbon fiber filter converts regular water into alkaline drinking water which is good for cooking, brewing coffee, removing tough stains and sterilization, acidic cleaning water which is good for brushing teeth, sunburn relief and sanitizing; Safety Setting automatically switches to purified drinking water to prevent accidental consumption of acidic water

ELECTROLYSIS: Alkaline water ionizer machine uses premium high-tech platinum- titanium electrolysis alloy plates to produce high quality of ionized acidic and alkaline water; 7 different stages of electrolysis includes 2 acidic, 1 purified, and 4 alkaline levels of water with even more precise pH adjustment options as well

CLEANING AND MAINTENANCE: Ionizer automatically engages a 10-second electrolysis chamber cleaning after every use; When in need of a more thorough clean the Ionizer will alert you and by the press of a button a 2-minute cleaning cycle will clean the electrolysis chamber for you, this machine will also alert you when the filter needs to be changed

ITEMS INCLUDED: 1 alkaline water ionizer filter that uses an active carbon filter, all necessary parts such as hoses and connectors, water pH testing kit for absolute confidence and peace of mind, user manual
